entry.title: Monday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning this morning then changing to a few rain showers early this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this morning then west 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Monday 10 April 2023
